channel.title: Delete the animated fire on a 317 client? Rep++!
channel.description:
I've tried every tut I could find on how to delete the animated fire from a 317 client.
I'm using the EDGE4PK Client..
Help please..rep++ for help.

item.title: Delete the animated fire on a 317 client? Rep++!
item.dc:creator: @Ian1045 Ian1045
item.description:
@Ian1045 wrote:

Sorry to sort of dig up this thread, just thought I should thank you… Worked for me

Read full topic

item.title: Delete the animated fire on a 317 client? Rep++!
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:12, topic:414915”][quote author=JGX link=topic=516875.msg3754251#msg3754251 date=1316297841]
Well yeah it might really work lol but it didn’t work for me.

Im using EDGE4PK source and client. and I opened client.java (client side) and seached for the statement you told me and it did not find anything.
[/quote]

Then find what TheCyberMan told you to find, if you can’t find it then you’re either retarded& don’t know what you’re talking about or, you have a different variable for that, (I highly doubt you do,) but it’s possible.[/quote]

Wtf? I tried that yesterday and It gave me 100 errors. Just tried it again and it worked!

I guess I should learn to “double-check” if you will. LOL.

Thanks guys I Rep++’ all of you who actually helped!

Read full topic
